events.name: lithium-ion recycling
events.wd_description: Methods for recycling lithium-ion batteries including pyrometallurgical, hydrometallurgical, bioleaching, and direct recycling.
events.description: Methods for recycling lithium-ion batteries including pyrometallurgical, hydrometallurgical, bioleaching, and direct recycling.

events.name: pyrometallurgical
events.wd_description: Employs extreme heat to transform metal oxides into cobalt, copper, iron, and nickel alloys.
events.description: Employs extreme heat to transform metal oxides into cobalt, copper, iron, and nickel alloys.

events.name: hydrometallurgy
events.wd_description: Uses aqueous solutions to leach targeted metals out from the cathode substance.
events.description: Uses aqueous solutions to leach targeted metals out from the cathode substance.

events.name: bioleaching
events.wd_description: Uses bacteria to retrieve precious metals.
events.description: Uses bacteria to retrieve precious metals.

events.name: Implications for policy and strategy
events.wd_description: Recommendations for governments and companies on managing competition risks and promoting international cooperation in the LIB supply chain.
events.description: Recommendations for governments and companies on managing competition risks and promoting international cooperation in the LIB supply chain.

events.name: Quantitative tools
events.wd_description: The use of quantitative tools to deduce and monitor the potential impacts of changes in production capacity and competition risk.
events.description: The use of quantitative tools to deduce and monitor the potential impacts of changes in production capacity and competition risk.

events.name: International cooperation
events.wd_description: Promoting close international cooperation, such as information sharing and joint production capacity, to minimize competition risks.
events.description: Promoting close international cooperation, such as information sharing and joint production capacity, to minimize competition risks.

events.name: Production capacity planning
events.wd_description: Strategic planning of production capacity investments to manage competition risks and ensure supply chain stability.
events.description: Strategic planning of production capacity investments to manage competition risks and ensure supply chain stability.

events.name: Data collection
events.wd_description: Collecting data on global competition intensities for 15 categories of LIB-related commodities.
events.description: Collecting data on global competition intensities for 15 categories of LIB-related commodities.

relations.wd_description: qualifies something (inception or end of a thing, event, or date) as happening previously to another thing
